greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of binomial coefficients binomial(3*n-k+1,3*n-3*k+1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 100 rows, flattened
program: (PARI) for(n=0,10, for(k=0,n, print1(binomial(3*n-k+1, 3*n-3*k+1), ", "))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2018
(MAGMA) /* As triangle */ [[Binomial(3*n-k+1, 3*n-3*k+1): k in [0..n]]: n in [0..10]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2018
results.author: _Emanuele Munarini_, May 04 2011
